blocks.content:
Want to get in touch? Please email [john@tweakdigital.co.uk](mailto:john@tweakdigital.co.uk).

I don't take permanent work so please don't contact me about it. I almost never know anyone that is looking. I do take contract roles but please check my availability (on the homepage of this site) before you reach out. I'm always happy to share contract roles as I often know other contractors who might be interested.
